analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xb01e8e97ec5a9b7d52160c9895c6efc678bfc544.sol:
	Contract Infinity has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xb01e8e97ec5a9b7d52160c9895c6efc678bfc544.sol#208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0xb01e8e97ec5a9b7d52160c9895c6efc678bfc544.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/28/0xb01e8e97ec5a9b7d52160c9895c6efc678bfc544.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0xb01e8e97ec5a9b7d52160c9895c6efc678bfc544.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
